title: DevConnector
description: A full-stack social networking platform for professionals:
Allows users to create profiles with work experience, social links, and GitHub repositories.
Enables interaction via posts, likes, and comments.

title: ShopSphere
description: A dynamic e-commerce platform with separate admin and user dashboards:
Admins manage products, categories, shipping, and orders.
Users enjoy seamless shopping with filters, cart management, and order tracking.

title: Bloggify
description: Users can create, read, comment, and engage with blogs for an interactive experience.

title: Task Organizer
description: A simple and efficient task management application:
Users can add, edit, and delete tasks with descriptions.
Task status tracking (incomplete/completed) for better organization.
Responsive design for seamless usage on all devices.
